PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-09542021-11-12,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActRailway Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Railway Safety Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the RAILWAY SAFETY ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to ensure the enforcement of the Government’s vaccination mandate in the rail sector through the establishment of an Administrative Monetary Penalties regime.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0228 Publication Date: 2021-11-24
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Railway Safety Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the RAILWAY SAFETY ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to ensure the enforcement of the Government’s vaccination mandate in the rail sector through the establishment of an Administrative Monetary Penalties regime.
